name: Monospace
description:
It's a long ways from home, isn't it...?

-

Monospace is a platformer about a young mouse lost, far away from his home. With only his trusty backpack, and the kindness of a few friendly birds, can you help him get back safe?

Estimated playtime: 2 hours.

-

CONTROLS

  • Move — WASD
  • Jump — J or Space
  • Dash — K

-

This game was developed for a period of around 5 months, and finished for Slow Jam Winnipeg 2022. As of writing, this game is finished, but may be updated in the future; specifically regarding difficulty/pacing and music.

Special thanks to Grayson Hennessey for suffering through the early versions of this game. The game was initially shown to be... frustrating, to say the least.
